name: Super Immune Boost
short_description: Yogurt with active cultures or probiotics-these are live bacteria that are in the yogurt. They got there because they were inserted into milk during the heating process that will help make the milk into the consistency of yogurt. The health benefits come from the live bacteria that still exists in the yogurt. The probiotic helps change and improve the bacteria in our GI tract.The Probiotics help improve our super immune system among other things.
